pos review: Good location in an upmarket area north of the city center. Acceptable accomodation at a cheap price. Still decent value for money.
neg review: Very basic and worn down. Simple rooms and hard bed. Very basic breakfast.

pos review:
Room was clean and shower was good. In general was OK
Not specific great thing,, however one good thing is 24/7 reception
neg review:
It doesn't have elevators,  careful if you have very heavy / large luggage 
The location wasn't very good at all. I booked this place only because it's closer to the airport but in the morning I cancelled the Uber as it would take 18 minutes for the car just to arrive and pick me up. I asked hotel to call a taxi,  theirs took 15 minutes to reach and finally 41 euros yo charge. Between city and this place, using public transport meant too many changes or too much walking

pos review: Good transport system, enough close to airport, near is Lidl, so i could buy for nice price salat for dinner.
neg review: In the evening of the first day there was no hot water. I booked this hotel 3 weeks before my work trip and paid 204 euros per night, so i expected more than just cold water. Last year i also stayed in 2 stars hotel, payed less money, but everthing was perfect.

pos review: The breakfast was alright. Staff was alright.
neg review: Shower and toilet were broken and barely usable. Room was too hot, no AC. Most of the fasilities need renovation.

pos review: Stuff at reception helpful and friendly.
neg review: Room smelled like someone smoked there before. Shower stucked water didn't flash away
The guy at the reception wasn't polite. The furniture at rooms are old and broken.
The building is very old and ned remodelation and some mantainecence.
